description: Have you ever wondered if there were ways to make using your iPhone or iPad even easier? Have you looked at your device's Settings and wondered what they all do and how they help? This course dives into everything you always wanted to know about (or didn't know you wanted to know) about using your Apple device. It was formulated by The MacSpa's team of Apple training professionals who have over thirty years cumulated Apple product experience.
title: iPad and iPhone Tips and Tricks for iOS 8
